EmailTemplates.ChangePassWordemail:
Dear {0} {1},

Your Password is updated successfully. Please use the latest password to login to the PRM360.COM.



If you have not changed the password and you have received this e-mail, it may mean that somebody else has changed the password.

Please contact 040- 42010360 immediately.
EmailTemplates.EmailFooter:
Thank You
PRM360 Team
Facebook // twitter
Website: www.prm360.com


IMPORTANT: This is a system-generated mail. Please do not reply to this email address. If you have a query or need any clarification, please contact Customer Care on 040-42010360.

CONFIDENTIALITY INFORMATION AND DISCLAIMER: This e-mail message and its attachments may contain confidential, proprietary or legally privileged information and is intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom it is addressed. If you have received this message erroneously, please delete it immediately and notify the sender. If you are not the intended recipient of this e-mail message, you should not disseminate, distribute or copy this e-mail. E-mail transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or error-free, as information could be intercepted, corrupted, lost, destroyed or incomplete or the e-mail can contain viruses and PRM360 accepts no liability for any damage caused by the limitations of e-mail transmission.
